Cover central design: "Fingon" by [[Denis Bridoux *Editorial and Letters *Book reviews *"Of the Spring of Arda" by Denis Bridoux **art by Kay Woollard *Recipe **text and art by Pauline Lee *"Elwing" **art by Lynn Close *"The Doom of Undómiel" by Valerie Sutton **art by Dora B. *The Wilmont Page, by Kay Woollard *"Halls of my Fathers" **text and art by Debra Haigh-Hutchinson *"Spider, wight and minotaur" by [[Rhona Beare]] **title by Dora B. *Addenda and Corrigenda to [[Weathertop 1|Issue Nº1]] *"The Terror of Tatty Walk, Part One" **text and art by Kay Woolard (Dora B.) *"Chapter House Dune", review by Denis Bridoux *"Yearsong" **text and art by Lynn Close {{title|journal}} [[Category:Weathertop (journal)]]
